Dear all, Six weeks into the closure of our University, we continue to adapt to a new set of uncertainties. The disruption to our daily lives, and to our normal ways of working, has been enormous. Beneath it all is a public health emergency that has made colleagues, friends and relatives seriously ill, and has in many cases led to personal tragedy.
